'''Character Details''' are posts by [[miHoYo]] announcing more details on new [[Characters]] on [[HoYoLAB]], Twitter, and Facebook. They include the profile of the character, including their [[birthday]], [[Character Ascension Materials|ascension]] and [[Character Talent Material|talent]] materials, [[Combat Talents]], and some Character Stories and [[Voice-Overs]].
